p: Total phenolic content (TPC) was determined using the Folin–Ciocalteau’s reagent according to the method reported by Lin and Tang [ 26] at 760 nm with a spectrophotometer (UV-1601; Shimadzu, Tokyo, Japan) and the quantification was done on the basis of the standard curve of gallic acid concentration ranging between 10–80 mg/mL (r 2 = 0.99).
